      • getOdometer

        public static Odometer getOdometer(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                                   EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
                                   double TRACK,
                                   double L_WHEEL_RAD,
                                   double R_WHEEL_RAD)
                            throws OdometerExceptions
        This method is meant to ensure only one instance of the odometer is used throughout the code.
        Parameters:
        leftMotor -
        rightMotor -
        Returns:
        new or existing Odometer Object
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • getOdometer

        public static Odometer getOdometer()
                            throws OdometerExceptions
        This class is meant to return the existing Odometer Object. It is meant to be used only if an odometer object has been created
        Returns:
        error if no previous odometer exists
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • enableCorrection

        public void enableCorrection()
        This method enables odometer correction by the odometry correction class

        public void disableCorrection()

      • getOdometryCorrection

        public OdometryCorrection getOdometryCorrection()

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is where the logic for the odometer will run. Use the methods provided from the OdometerData class to implement the odometer.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
